mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.summary, a.thumbnail, a.view_count, a.create_time, c.name AS categoryName FROM article a LEFT JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.id WHERE a.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY a.view_count DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, summary = #{summary}, category_id = #{categoryId}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, is_top = #{isTop}, status = #{status}, is_comment = #{isComment}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
